addCertification(uint256,string).notice: Called by the assigned quality inspector to add certification

approveQuality(uint256,uint256).notice: Called by assigned quality inspector to approve quality

assignDistributor(uint256,address).notice: Producer assigns a distributor (and transfers ownership to them)

assignQualityInspector(uint256,address).notice: Producer assigns a quality inspector for the product

createProduct(string,string,string,uint2.notice: Producer creates a product. productId is assigned automatically.

getBasicProductInfo(uint256).notice: Convenience getter: returns basic product info (avoid returning full struct if large)

getFullProductDetails(uint256).notice: Get full product details including all entity addresses

getProducerDetails(address).notice: Admin convenience: set expiry date or logistics info

sellToConsumer(uint256,address).notice: Retailer sells to consumer (final transfer). buyer can be any address.
